channel.title: INtech
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INtech, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: 7 Best Lighted Makeup Mirrors (2024), Tested and Reviewed
item.description: Ensure a flawless finish every time with these WIRED-tested picks, no matter where you're putting on your face.

item.title: How Do You Live a Happier Life? Notice What Was There All Along
item.description: Reacquaint yourself with the good things in life by taking the time to appreciate them—and yes, it’s OK to rush through the bad stuff.

item.title: WIRED Tested Miracle Hangover Cures. You're Welcome
item.description: Do “anti-hangover” supplements really work? With the sterling help of a UK rugby team, we raised a glass or five to find out.

item.title: The 15 Shows We’re Most Looking Forward to in 2025
item.description: From Black Rabbit to The White Lotus, these are the TV shows we can’t wait to see debut—or return—in the coming year.

item.title: The 20 Most Anticipated Movies of 2025
item.description: From Bong Joon-ho’s Mickey 17 to James Gunn’s Superman, these are the movies we’re most excited to see next.
